summary.p: Converts a given value to a Unicode character.

examples.p: The following shows TO_CHAR results for some input data:
examples.sampleCode: SELECT 'The TO_CHAR result of value ''0'' is: ' AS Input, TO_CHAR('0') AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_CHAR result of value ''A'' is: ', TO_CHAR('A') UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_CHAR result of value 48 is: ' AS Input, TO_CHAR(48) AS Value UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_CHAR result of value 65 is: ', TO_CHAR(65) UNION ALL SELECT 'The TO_CHAR result of value 1250 is: ', TO_CHAR(1250)
